venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description:
Psychic and Psychological Perspectives on Schizophrenia and Hauntings

Friday, September 23rd, 7 pm to 8:30 pm

Join Isabeau Esby and Dr. Joel Glenn Wixson, clinical psychologist, as they discuss how Schizophrenia is viewed, managed and emotionally processed in our Western culture.  As a psychic medium, Isabeau will bring her direct experiences with the other side to explain the affects of hauntings and spirit possessions of individuals and the connection to Schizophrenia.  Joel will share his experiences and knowledge from years of working in the Psychology field with patients suffering from Schizophrenia.  Join us as we examine counter cultural ideas of Psychological afflictions.  A question and answer session will follow.


Location - KRI, The Center for Consciousness Studies, 1 Bayside Rd, Unit 5, Greenland, NH
Located in the Gowen’s Corner Plaza on Route 33 in Greenland. Directions - from I-95, take exit 3 to Route 33 West.  The Center is located 2.6 miles on the right at the corner of 33 and Bayside
Registration is NOT required, drop ins absolutely welcome, open to the public, attendance of all three lectures not required
Cost - $10 suggested donation
item.name: Psychic and Psychological Perspectives on Schizophrenia and Hauntings
